search-devs-description: 'Search d_evs' is a practical and functional application that demonstrates front-end development skills, including integrating with the GitHub API and creating intuitive and responsive user interfaces. The application aims to provide a simple and effective experience for users who want to explore and connect with the GitHub developer community.
marvel-description: 'marvel-v1' is a practical and functional application that demonstrates front-end development skills, including integrating with the Marvel API and creating intuitive and responsive user interfaces. The application aims to provide a simple and effective experience for users who want to explore characters from the Marvel universe.
